type.name: Exif2CssReturn
type.desc: The return type of the function.
type.prop: The complete CSS `transform` rule that contains all transforms.
The transform origin CSS rule for orientations >= 5.

prop.type: {translateY: number, translateX: number, rotate: number, rotateY: number}
prop.name: transforms

type.prop: The raw transforms as numbers, where translates are either `-1` or `1` and rotations are either `90`, `180` and `270`.

prop.type: {translateY: string, translateX: string, rotate: string, rotateY: string}
prop.name: transformStrings

type.prop: The transforms split by individual rules that can be applied in the browser.
